overview: Many northeast Indians migrate to south India for a livelihood; Jerryna chon is one of them. She is a fresher - lonely mother who's new to the land. Jerryna works at a Spa offering home service. That particular day, she must get four stars from the next customer to retain her license. However, the next service is a nightmare. The story tries to question the star rating system considered as a whip of modern slavery.
title: Life in Stars
